# accessGranted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the user granted the application access to accounts of this type.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessGranted: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the application has access to accounts of this type; otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing Properties

- **accountTypeDescription**: A human-readable description of the account type.
- **identifier**: The unique identifier for the account type.
